law.text: Any person who violates KRS 165A.470, 165A.480, 165A.500, or 165A.505 shall be fined not less than one hundred dollars ($100) nor more than three hundred dollars ($300) or be imprisoned for not less than ten (10) days nor more than thirty (30) days, or both fined and imprisoned for each offense.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 15, effective April 9, 2002. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 12.
